Text.Value: You're too late - I've encountered the convoy, led by a drider.
You're the one Jaheira entrusted to infiltrate Moonrise, aren't you? Gods be with you.

EditorData.logicalname: Waiting at bridge - Has not met

Text.Value: If you insist. I'll mark your map - but waste no more time than is needed. This chance is too precious to miss.
Quickly, then. I will mark the rendezvous point, should you lose your way.
May the road rise to meet you, and the shadows keep at bay.
Walk tall, friend.
We will survive. We must survive.
For now, then, I can only wait. I eagerly await the next call to battle.
Let's take them down. You lead, I follow.
The farther you stray from Last Light, the stronger the curse becomes - and Moonrise is beyond where the shadows are darkest.
A drider? Gods - yet still your heart beats. Most impressive.
You brought hope, just as we'd lost it. But we're not out of this yet.

EditorData.logicalname: Waiting next to inn - Has met

Text.Value: You won't survive the journey without protection - and we know where you can find it.
We've shared but one victory, friend. But it will not be our last.

EditorData.logicalname: Back at inn - Has not met

Text.Value: At your side until we claim victory, my friend.
Let no cultist remain standing.
'True Soul', I believe? How fortunate we are, to have you among us.

EditorData.logicalname: Waiting next to inn - Has not met

Text.Value: Let's move - we can't miss our chance to strike the convoy.
Go on ahead. I'll catch up.
I need time to prepare.
We've been tracking cultists who pass through the shadows unharmed, guided by an uncanny light. We plan to steal it.
We are exposed. With Isobel gone, each of us must rely on the others.
With your help, we'll destroy their convoy. Then you can forge a path to the tower, with their light to guide you.

Synopsis: A Harper, possibly getting ready for a mission that will see them trying to kill a drider - a big, dangerous monster.
